game.name: Space Conflict
game.description:
Hey captain! Your space is in a big trouble. Experts have already noticed a meteorite attack on the universe and you are the only person who can save it. Would you think that you are a right person for this job? Join Space Conflict and be prepared to clear the space from all the deadly meteors before they attack you! Grab your seat on your chosen space ship filled with a sufficient amount of cannons! Start your engines and enter the biggest shooting environment!

Your objective in this brand new adventure game is to destroy the meteors as fast as you can with the help of your cannons. Fly your ship and go near to your enemies and destroy them before things get worse! Hurry up, friends! The biggest space marathon has just begun and you would not have any choice except to fight in this HTML5 war game. Be careful and battle like a hero to grab space credits and acquire increasingly powerful spaceships!

Your good performance will also help to enhance the capabilities of your ship. Do not forget to explore the wonderful weapons of your chosen ship and surprise your rivals with your intense power. Stay long to earn more and buy other combat ships in this one of the best fighting games for boys! Your enemies are very clear and will keep attacking on you. So try to be fast to avoid the damage caused by them as a single collision will cause your life. Good luck to play even more tricky free space games on atmegame.com and have fun!
